EmailTemplate.name: 03-06-22 DBNK CBA Live Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Join NCR at CBA Live
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NCR Digital BankingJoin us at BOOTH 1 and see why banks trust NCR with their complete digital-first banking transformation All Things CryptoJoin CTO, Tim Vanderham and NCR on stage to learn about Crypto, digital transformation and more Bank Utilization of Cryptocurrency & Blockchain Technology – 3.7 @ 2:15 Banking on Digital- 3.7 @ 4:15 <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/digital-first-banking-video?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=ContactUS-DBNK-Marketo&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> Need more from your technology partner? Digital-first experiences are at the heart of everything we do <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/digital-first-banking-video?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=ContactUS-DBNK-Marketo&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=Digital_Banking]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
